projects.title: Magurn
projects.description: A python application which scrapes data from torrent indexers and finds the best torrent magnet for the specific search term

projects.title: MealGen
projects.description: A meal planning app that generates recipes based on selected ingredients, with JWT authentication and a clean Tailwind UI

projects.title: MusicX
projects.description: A Python GUI app to download songs and playlists from Spotify and YouTube with metadata support

projects.title: Dress-AR
projects.description: AR web app for virtual clothing try-ons using 3D models and pose detection

projects.title: Picot
projects.description: Discord bot that fetches and delivers raw images from Pexels and Unsplash APIs for designers and developers

projects.title: 1hr
projects.description: A multi-dashboard platform for managing hiring processes between clients, vendors and admins with candidate tracking and job opening management
